snippet.title: Hell Clock | Reveal Trailer |
snippet.description:
Playtest Hell Clock now for a limited time! https://otk.to/hellclock
Join our Discord for future playtests: https://www.discord.gg/hellclockgame

Forge powerful builds with endless loot in this relentless combination of Roguelike and ARPG. Blast through dungeons and unleash inhuman powers in a dark fantasy twist on Brazil’s War of Canudos.

In the 19th century, a grim chapter of Brazilian history unfolded in the badlands. The settlement of Canudos had grown into a sanctuary for thousands seeking refuge. But when they defied the newly formed Republican Army, their resistance was met with devastating force. 25,000 men, women, and children were massacred.

Play as Pajeú, a warrior who earned his freedom in battle, fighting to rescue the soul of The Counselor—his mentor and spiritual leader of Canudos. With each descent, time bends and your powers grow as you face ever-stronger horrors commanding the dark forces that claimed The Counselor's head and trapped his soul.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FEATURES:

RACE AGAINST TIME
Every second counts as you battle the undead forces of your oppressors. Risk delving deeper for powerful loot and face the nightmarish incarnations of those who sought to bury the truth.

FORGE UNSTOPPABLE BUILDS
Hunt down ancient Relics infused with the strength of resistance. Create devastating combinations that channel Canudos's unbreakable spirit into unstoppable power.

UNLEASH HELLISH POWER
Master a diverse selection of devastating abilities born from righteous fury. Dance through hordes with lightning-fast knife strikes, smash enemies with Canudos' great bell, or rain rapid-fire death from your trusty sidearm.

REWRITE HISTORY
Each descent brings new chances to right historical wrongs. Discover unique combinations of Blessings to evolve your build as you face the demons of Brazil's dark past, present, and future.

FIGHT AT YOUR OWN PACE
Whether you seek a brutal test against history's oppressors or a thoughtful journey of justice, Hell Clock adapts to your path. Remove all time pressure with Relaxed Mode, or push your limits in Hardcore mode.

VENGEANCE NEVER ENDS
Experience a complete three-act story campaign, then test your perfectly-tuned builds in the challenging Endgame, where your gear, abilities, and playstyle are pushed to their limits.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HELL CLOCK SOCIALS: 🔥
Twitter - https://twitter.com/HellClockGame
TikTok - https://tiktok.com/@HellClockGame
Instagram - https://instagram.com/HellClockGame
Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/hellclockgame.bsky.social
YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/@roguesnail/
Discord - https://Discord.gg/HellClockGame

MAD MUSHROOM SOCIALS: 🍄
Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/MadMushroomGG
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@madmushroomgg
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/MadMushroomGG
Twitch - https://www.twitch.tv/MadMushroomGG
Discord - https://Discord.gg/MadMushroomGG
Bluesky - https://bsky.app/profile/madmushroomgg.bsky.social

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

#HellClock #HellClockGame #OTKGamesExpo #OTK #MadMushroom
